00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              PULSE-BASED ENVELOPE SUBSTITUTION
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00006  *              copyright © 2000-2004 by Timothy A. Place
00007  *
00008  */
00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_PULSESUB_H
00012 #define TT_PULSESUB_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_offset.h"
00017 #include "tt_phasor.h"
00018 #include "tt_adsr.h"
00019 #include "tt_multiply.h"
00020 #include "tt_audio_signal.h"
00021 
00022 
00023 /********************************************************
00024         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00025 
00026         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00027  ********************************************************/
00028 
00029 class tt_pulsesub:public tt_audio_base{
00030 
00031         private:
00032                 enum constants{
00033                         k_num_temp_signals = 2,
00034                 };
00035 
00036                 tt_offset                               *offset;                                        // member tap.tools objects
00037                 tt_phasor                               *phasor;
00038                 tt_adsr                                 *env_gen;
00039                 tt_multiply                             *scaler;        
00040                 tt_audio_signal                 *temp[k_num_temp_signals];      // Temp Signals
00041                         
00042         public:
00043                 enum selectors{                                 // Attribute Selectors
00044                         k_mode,
00045                                 k_mode_linear,
00046                                 k_mode_exponential,
00047                         k_attack,
00048                         k_decay,
00049                         k_sustain,
00050                         k_release,
00051                         k_frequency,                            // phasor freq
00052                         k_length,                                       // offset length for duty-cycle control
00053                 };
00054                 
00055 
00056                 // OBJECT LIFE ************************************************************
00057                 tt_pulsesub()                                                                           // Constructor          
00058                 {
00059                         short i;
00060                         for(i=0; i < k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00061                                 temp[i] = new tt_audio_signal(vectorsize);              // allocate temp signals
00062                         
00063                         env_gen = new tt_adsr;
00064                         phasor = new tt_phasor;
00065                         offset = new tt_offset;
00066                         scaler = new tt_multiply;
00067                                 
00068                         // Default Settings
00069                         // set_attr(k_ratio, 1.0);
00070                         // set_attr(k_windowsize, 87.0);
00071                 }
00072 
00073                 ~tt_pulsesub()                                                                  // Destructor
00074                 {
00075                         short i;
00076 
00077                         delete offset;
00078                         delete phasor;
00079                         delete env_gen;
00080                         delete scaler;
00081         
00082                         // FREE THE TEMP SIGNALS
00083                         for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00084                                 delete temp[i];
00085                 }
00086 
00087 
00088                 // ATTRIBUTES ************************************************************
00089                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00090                 {
00091                         switch(sel){
00092                                 case k_attack:
00093                                         env_gen->set_attr(tt_adsr::k_attack, val);
00094                                         break;
00095                                 case k_decay:
00096                                         env_gen->set_attr(tt_adsr::k_decay, val);
00097                                         break;
00098                                 case k_sustain:
00099                                         env_gen->set_attr(tt_adsr::k_sustain_db, val);
00100                                         break;
00101                                 case k_release:
00102                                         env_gen->set_attr(tt_adsr::k_release, val);
00103                                         break;
00104                                 case k_mode:
00105                                         if(val == k_mode_exponential)
00106                                                 env_gen->set_attr(tt_adsr::k_mode, tt_adsr::k_mode_exponential);
00107                                         else
00108                                                 env_gen->set_attr(tt_adsr::k_mode, tt_adsr::k_mode_linear);
00109                                         break;
00110                                 case k_frequency:
00111                                         phasor->set_attr(tt_phasor::k_frequency, val);
00112                                         break;
00113                                 case k_length:
00114                                         offset->set_attr(tt_offset::k_offset_value, val - 0.5);
00115                                         break;
00116                         }
00117                 }
00118 
00119                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00120                 {
00121                         switch(sel){
00122                                 case k_attack:
00123                                         return env_gen->get_attr(tt_adsr::k_attack);
00124                                 case k_decay:
00125                                         return env_gen->get_attr(tt_adsr::k_decay);
00126                                 case k_sustain:
00127                                         return env_gen->get_attr(tt_adsr::k_sustain_db);
00128                                 case k_release:
00129                                         return env_gen->get_attr(tt_adsr::k_release);
00130                                 case k_mode:
00131                                         {
00132                                                 tt_selector tempsel = (tt_selector)env_gen->get_attr(tt_adsr::k_mode);
00133                                                 if(tempsel == tt_adsr::k_mode_linear)
00134                                                         return k_mode_linear;
00135                                                 else
00136                                                         return k_mode_exponential;
00137                                         }
00138                                 case k_frequency:
00139                                         return phasor->get_attr(tt_phasor::k_frequency);
00140                                 case k_length:
00141                                         return offset->get_attr(tt_offset::k_offset_value);
00142                                 default:
00143                                         return -1;
00144                         }
00145                 }
00146                 
00147                 void set_trigger(bool value)
00148                 {
00149                         env_gen->set_trigger(value);
00150                 }
00151                 
00152                 /*****************************************************
00153                  * DSP LOOPS
00154                  *****************************************************/
00155                 // Because this is a meta-object, it is the user of this object who is responsible for making sure that
00156                 //      the vectorsize of the signals are the same as that of this object.
00157 
00158                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00159                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00160                 {
00161                         phasor->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0]);                       // ramp wave, stored in a temporary vector
00162                         offset->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);      // offset the ramp wave, effectively altering the duty cycle
00163                         env_gen->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[0]);     // generate the envelope, reusing the temp[0] vector
00164                         scaler->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[0], out);      // apply the envelope to the input vector
00165                 }
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169         public:
00170                 // ADDITIONAL METHODS ************************************************************
00171                                 
00172                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00173                 void set_sr(int value)
00174                 {
00175                         if(value != sr){
00176                                 sr = value;
00177                                 r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00178                                 m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00179                                 
00180                                 phasor->set_sr(sr);
00181                                 offset->set_sr(sr);
00182                                 env_gen->set_sr(sr);
00183                                 scaler->set_sr(sr);
00184                         }
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 // set the vector size (override the inherited method)
00188                 void set_vectorsize(int value)
00189                 {
00190                         short i;
00191                         if(value != vectorsize){
00192                                 vectorsize = value;
00193 
00194                                 phasor->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00195                                 offset->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00196                                 env_gen->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00197                                 scaler->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00198                 
00199                                 // RESIZE THE TEMP SIGNALS
00200                                 for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00201                                         temp[i]->alloc(vectorsize);
00202                         }
00203                 }
00204 };
00205 
00206 
00207 #endif  // TT_PULSESUB_H
